titles.title: A resolution honoring the important contribution to the Nation of the Academy of Music in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, on its 150th Anniversary.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/25/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the Academy of Music in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, on its 150th anniversary and honors the important contributions of the Academy of Music to the nation.
